Shoreline.Edmonds Community College: Edmonds Community College is a public community college in Lynnwood, in the metropolitan area of Seattle, Washington, United States. More than 21,000 students annually take courses for credit toward a certificate or degree at the college in Snohomish County, Washington. The college employs more than 1,697 people, including 138 full-time and 443 part-time instructors and 292 students.
